tr.td: ONU wins toss and defers. MU will receive and defend the South goal.
Tom Fleser kickoff 54 yards to the MUSK11, Caleb Gaiters return 12 yards to the MUSK23 (David Haseleu; LandryHostetler).
Grffin Degener pass complete to Warren Wilson for 55 yards to the ONU22 (Dan Eller).
Warren Wilson rush for 2 yards to the ONU20 (Zach Schmerge).
Warren Wilson rush for loss of 1 yard to the ONU21 (LandryHostetler).
Grffin Degener pass incomplete to Hayes-Carruth.
Cody Dent field goal attempt from 38 BLOCKED, recovered by ONU Cody Cox, spot at ONU38, clock 13:09 (blocked by Kyle Gonterman), Cody Cox for no gain to the ONU38.
